dashboard.description: Proxmox Virtual Environment (10347) & Proxmox Backup Server (GitHub) Dashboards

targets.expr: sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (host_system, id, name, pretty_name, version, version_codename, version_id) (node_os_info{host_system=~"$node_names"})

(sum by (host_system) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$node_names", mode!="idle"}[5m])) / 
on(host_system) group_left sum by (host_system)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$node_names"}[5m]))))
pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"node.*"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on (id, instance) pve_up==1)
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id) pve_node_info and on(id) pve_up == 1
pve_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id) pve_node_info and on(id) pve_up == 1
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"node.*"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id) pve_up==1)

panels.description: Sums all network send/receive metrics across guests - since a lot of traffic will be 'internal' to Proxmox (i.e. between guests) this does not represent total network input/output for Proxmox.

targets.expr: (rate(pve_network_receive_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(rate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*"}[$__rate_interval]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description: Percentage used is the % of total node CPU, not the % of guest CPU used (see below for details of CPU use against guest's CPU allocation).

targets.expr: ((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id!~"node.*"}) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1)
pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

panels.title: Overall Guest CPU Load

panels.description: Percentage used is the % of total node memory used, not % of guest memory used (see below for details of memory use against guest's memory allocation).

targets.expr: ((pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id!~"node.*"})  * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type)  pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1)
pve_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

panels.title: Overall Guest Memory Use

panels.description: Percentage used is the % of total node CPU, not the % of guest CPU used (see below for details of CPU use against guest's CPU allocation).

targets.expr:
((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id!~"node.*"}) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) / 
sum(pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"})

sum by (instance) (
  ((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id!~"node.*"}) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) / 
sum(pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"})
)

(pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) /
sum(pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"})

panels.title: Overall Guest CPU Use (%)

panels.description: Percentage used is the % of total node memory used, not % of guest memory used (see below for details of memory use against guest's memory allocation).

targets.expr:
((pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id!~"node.*"})  * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type)  pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) /
sum(pve_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"})

sum by (instance) (
  ((pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id!~"node.*"})  * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type)  pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) /
  sum(pve_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"})
)

(pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) / 
sum(pve_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"})

panels.title: Overall Guest Memory Use (%)

targets.expr: sum by(id, name, type, node) (pve_guest_info{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$guest_ids"})
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$guest_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$guest_ids"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$guest_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$guest_ids"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (host_system, id, name, pretty_name, version, version_codename, version_id) (node_os_info{host_system=~"$guest_names"})

(sum by (host_system) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$guest_names", mode!="idle"}[5m])) / 
on(host_system) group_left sum by (host_system)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$guest_names"}[5m]))))
((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
sum (((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"(lxc|qemu).*"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1)

sum by(host_system) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$guest_names", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(host_system) group_left sum by (host_system)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$guest_names"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description:
pve_cpu_usage_ratio is a representation of the CPU load as detected by the Proxmox host. Its value is between 0 and the number of cores assigned to the guest (pve_cpu_usage_limit). 

pve_cpu_usage_ratio is divided by the number of allocated cores to get CPU usage % (see separate chart). 
This chart should stay below allocated core count.

targets.expr: ((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"}) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
sum (((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"(lxc|qemu).*"}) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1)

panels.title: Guest CPU Load

panels.description: Load shouldn't exceed number of cores.
panels.title: NODE EXPORTER - System Load

targets.expr: (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"} / pve_memory_size_bytes * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
sum ( (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"(lxc|qemu).*"} / pve_memory_size_bytes * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1 )

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr: ((pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"})  * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type)  pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1)
sum ( ((pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"(lxc|qemu).*"})  * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type)  pve_guest_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1) )
pve_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"node.*"} and on(id,instance) pve_node_info and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: NODE EXPORTER - Memory Use

targets.expr: ( irate(pve_disk_write_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"}[$__rate_interval]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
( irate(pve_disk_read_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"}[$__rate_interval]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1

panels.description: Summed by system, can be broken down per disk ({{device}}) if preferred.
panels.title: NODE EXPORTER - Disk Read / Write

targets.expr: (irate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"}[$__rate_interval])* on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(irate(pve_network_receive_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",id=~"$guest_ids"}[$__rate_interval]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$storage_ids"} / pve_disk_size_bytes * on (id, instance) group_left(storage) pve_storage_info
sum by(id, name, type, node) (pve_guest_info{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"})
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id) pve_up==1)

sum(pbs_used{host_system=~"$pbs_host_system", datastore=~"$pbs_datastore", vm_name=~"$pbs_guest"}) by (host_system,datastore,vm_id,vm_name) / sum(pbs_size{host_system=~"$pbs_host_system", datastore=~"$pbs_datastore", vm_name=~"$pbs_guest"}) by (host_system,datastore,vm_id,vm_name)

sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance=~"$instance.*", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} and on (id) pve_up==1)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance=~"$instance.*",template!="1", id=~"$node_ids|$guest_ids|$storage_ids"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id) pve_up==1)

(sum by (host_system) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$guest_names|$node_names|$storage_names", mode!="idle"}[5m])) / 
on(host_system) group_left sum by (host_system)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_system=~"$guest_names|$node_names|$storage_names"}[5m]))))
